subject: Leadership
title: Team Motivation
description: A micro-lesson that makes Team Motivation usable.

hook.text: A company doubles bonuses. Productivity doesn't budge. Another gives teams autonomy. Productivity soars.

buildup.text: Daniel Pink's research: intrinsic motivation comes from autonomy, mastery, and purposeâ€”not money alone.

discovery.text: Teams motivated by meaning outperform those driven by rewards. External incentives can even reduce creativity.

twist.text: Money mattersâ€”but only to a point. Once basic needs are met, purpose and growth drive more than bonuses.

climax.text: Leaders motivate by connecting work to impact, offering growth paths, and giving freedom in how to work.

punchline.text: Pay people fairly. Then give them meaning.
